name: ReBot (Better_Blood)
description:
Our robot is being hunted by chrome bots! You can destroy robots to collect their parts. You must go to the far left and get a key to the city that they kicked you out of. WASD for movement and left click to shoot, E to interact. P to pause.

Collaborators :

https://alexanderross.itch.io/

https://insomniclipse.itch.io/
